statements: UPDATE WineVarieties SET variety_name='Merlot', origin='France' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE TastingNotes SET taster_name = 'Alice', tasting_date = '2022-03-15', aroma_description = 'Citrusy and floral', flavor_profiles = ARRAY['fruity', 'buttery'] WHERE note_id = '46c6d9fc-b6ec-4c12-b2c4-d5c3d9217075';
